home.caption: Martin Junghans · Software Developer · Professionally since 2019

about.title: About Me
content: Hi, I'm Martin Junghans! I'm a professional software developer from Leipzig. My passion for computers and IT has been with me since I was a child. In 2019, I took the plunge and turned my hobby into a career. Since then, I have been exploring various aspects of the digital world with curiosity and excitement, building up my knowledge and skills in a determined and strategic way.

My journey began with a degree in computer science at BA Leipzig. During this time, I was able to quickly and systematically acquire many basics. Following my curiosity, I first learned Python and got to grips with the topics of AI, data structures and algorithms. Later, I started to specialize as a front-end developer. Thanks to this shift in focus, I now have extensive knowledge of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and TypeScript. I have already applied my skills in various professional and private projects. In this context, I have also worked with various web frameworks, CSS libraries and preprocessors, build tools and test environments.

I am currently expanding my knowledge of backend and dev ops. In addition, I plan to continue my education in the areas of software architecture, artificial intelligence, cyber security and virtual reality.
